alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 6:06PM CDT until August 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northern Shackelford County in west central Texas... Southwestern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 604 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Griffin, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Haskell, northern Shackelford and southwestern Throckmorton Counties, including the following locations... The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us-283 and The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
